string: The cops interrupted the hacking. Get it going again.
Find a way through the entrance into the Bikers clubhouse.
You can now grab the loot for the Dentist. Look for a golden chest.
Hoxton needs access to the main FBI intelligence servers in the Operations Room. The servers have the information that you need.
Trade the hostage for your teammate.
Search the mainframe for the next box.
Take care of the lasers and carry the gold to the insertion point
Follow the mechanic to the truck
Find your way up to the end of the overpass - Bile will pick you up with the helicopter. Make sure you have Matt with you!
Make sure Charon makes it to the escape van.
Caution! Guards may see your gun this close!
Wait for the time lock to finish
The saw has finished. Remove it!
Head down to the bottom of the yacht and gain access to the server room
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to Switch Trip Mine to Sensor Mode
Trick the FBI HQ by contacting them via the communication relay and request the daily code.
The escape boat will be waiting for you at the lake in a couple of minutes.
Make your way to the house
Use the zip-line to get to the crane
The escape van will be waiting for you at the main road in a couple of minutes. Stay alive until then!
Destroy 8 bags of weapons stashed inside the gangster hideout
Take the bomb parts from the containers and take them to the helicopter.
Find evidence the FBI will use against you and secure it. It should be scattered throughout the house.
Enter the car shop to take shelter from the blast, and get the car keys
Kill the guard and answer his pager.
Find the correct symbol combination to open the ark.
Get the loot to the van
Stay alive until the loot boat returns
Without getting noticed, set-up the hacking devices and hack the machines
Make it back to the previous courtyard and wait for Bain's instructions
Make sure the computer is processing. See to it that the cops do not cut the power, if they do you have to turn it back on fast to keep the computers running.
Plant the C4 in the Gambling Hall
Move all the cash to the van
Search for the Moretta's Comm Frequency on the computers.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to unpack the sentry gun
Find something to bridge the gap
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to fill the water tank
Locate wire boxes and cut the colored cables. Make sure to cut the correct ones, or the alarm will go off!
Drive to the dock yard as fast as possible!
Search the biolab for the correct chemicals to create a corrosive compound.
Destroying cameras reduces the police's intel on you.
One of the specially marked Murkywater containers will be the one that holds our vault. Find it.
Find the Operations Room where the main FBI intelligence servers are kept.
Make sure nobody sees the computer.
Exit through the lobby entrance. Stay casual.
You've been made! Burn the truck and get out of there
Take down the snipers so that Charon can move to your location.
Alarm tripped: Police detected a drill
Get inside Black Ridge and fight your way to the inner complex.
Look for the keycards, you need two of them to get that vault open, remember to check the tellers.
Use the drill to get to the vault
Go through with the drug deal. This is the front that allows us to enter the building.
The cops have extinguished the flare. Get it lit again.
Find out which is the right one by looking for clues
Fire up the balloon at the cage you assembled.
Step inside the airlock. It leads to the inner complex.
Use a flare to mark the pick up location.
Pick up the thermal drill in the elevator

You need two keycards. Look out for a security area or other important areas such as office desks. Use one on the control panel to get the green light to use the second keycard by the panel down by the big gates. Timing is the key!
Metal detectors can instantly detect your gear. Bypass them by disabling the electricity. You are searching for electricity boxes.

Wait for Taxman to show the server we are after. Scare him into the limo when you see it - we need both the server and the taxman. Alex will lift him up to us from the open street. Also, keep an eye out for what you can use to better your chances.
Get to the van to escape!
Check the laptops for the location of the USB drive.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to use a shaped charge
Open the door to the alley.
Kill the traitor for his betrayal.
The Tin Boy toy is in one of the red gift boxes located inside the toy store. Go find it!
Use C4 to breach the construction site walls. Inside is a truck we can use to transport the safes.
Get the loot to your escape vehicle and secure it.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to place the hard drive
Collect the C4 from the bag that was dropped by the chopper.
Grab the VR headset for Vlad!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up the metal sheet
Three different numbers form the access code for the vault. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
Follow Bain through the Laundry Room
Find a gas can and put it in the trap container.
Use the computer in the ship control room and enter the GPS coordinates.
Infiltrate the compound and destroy the weapons
Attach the cars to the helicopter's magnet so that Bile can lift them up.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to bag a piece of samurai armor
More gangsters in this area clear them out.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to Switch Trip Mine to Explosive Mode
Defend the computer while we hack into the garage security system.
Don't forget to leave with the camera and the tapes
Approve Hoxton's security clearance request on the secure file he needs.
Bag up the gold and hide it in the correct container.
Locate and enter the server room
The mercs don't want you to scan those test subjects. Keep them off it!
Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
Clear a path for the armored truck so it can continue.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take missing animal poster
Vlad has all the presents he needs. You can continue to make more presents or wait to escape.
Escort Charon to the Escape Van
Find the server room - it's on the second floor. Unlock the door using the keycard.
Vlad's transport vans have been tossed about by the earthquake. We need to locate them.
Put a doctor bag on the ground and heal yourself.
Lift the gold out of here
You are in casing mode. Mask on to start the heist.
Look for the fireworks in the storage room and take them.
Find a way to override the security lockdown.
Attach the wires to the Christmas tree
Escort Mr. Pink back to the warehouse
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a hacked computer
Connect the heavy cable to the pick-up and the hatch, then start it up.
Alarm tripped: Civilian saw someone breaking and entering and called the police
In order to prevent the codes to the vault from cycling you are going to have to place a device at the keypad to the vault.
Bain has been released from his cell and is heading to the rooftop through the canteen, follow him!
Alarm tripped: Police detected a sentry gun
Kill the guard and hide his body.
You already have the max amount of body bags.
Light a flare to signal Bile for the escape.
Secure more loot in the getaway van or escape!
Scan the blueprints and fax them to Bain
Escort the CFO to the roof
Looks like Charon is in trouble look for suspicious activity.
Locke can't proceed until you clear the area of enemies.
Use $BTN_INTERACT; to shout at civilians and keep them in check.
Get to the marked man hole, and make your way down into the sewers.
Hold out until the voting data has been scrambled
Pick the right door to open
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the BFD tool
Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a sentry gun and called the police
Access the computer and delete all the intel they have on Crime.Net.
Defend yourself from the gang members. Use wood to board the windows.
The bollards are blocking the truck. Open the doors inside the garage to find the control room, and lower the bollards.
Locke's helicopter is waiting to collect the pallets. Ignite the flare to bring him in.
Put on your mask to break out of the shipping crates.
Get the code from the managers computer
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to search the cigar boxes
Use the compound to eat through the door.
Alarm tripped: Pager operator didn't receive an answer
Alarm tripped: Camera detected an explosion
Press TAB to get more info on your objectives
Get inside the FBI safe house. Be aware of the alarm on all the doors and windows. Once a door or window is opened, you have a limited time to disable the alarm.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to disable the display case alarm
Alarm tripped: Civilian saw suspicious activity and called the police
Take all the winch parts to the vault and set them up!
The wall is blocking our way in. Use the anti-air missiles that we hacked and blow it up!
Park the car in one of the containers.
Bridge the construction hole that is blocking the truck's path.
Enter the place where the polls are held
Give lady Justice what she deserves and enter the basement
Kill the guard inside the security room.
Get into the house and locate the meth lab.
Find and grab the briefcase Charon mentioned.
You need a mayan gold bar
You guys remember that sketchy old house out in the forest? Where Hector's guys were cooking up meth? Well, we're headed back there.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to open the circuit breaker box

The mechanic needs a special part from a bike located inside the garage. Open the garage to make way for our friendly mechanic. Escort and guard him to the objective. Once he got his parts, get back to the truck with him.
Use the terminal to upload shipping information to Bain, which he'll use to try and track the correct truck.
Wait for the hacking to finish
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to add the saw blade
Secure all of the money in the vault
Move through the roof and access the new building.
Drill the door to the office
The BFD is drilling into the vault. Wait for her, and keep the cops away.
Use the meth lab to cook meth and defend your position.
$HELPER; traded a hostage and got you out of custody!
The crane is moving the trap now, wait for it to get into place.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the valid blood sample
Wait for the ship to move
Everyone must stand in the circle by the safe. Don't leave until the timer is finished!
Pick up the bags containing the drill parts and bring them to the vault.
Wait for the hack to finish and make sure the power stays on.
Get the loot into the escape van up on the street
Light a flare on the roof to signal Bile to drop some C4 on the roof using his helicopter.
Check the limo and see if you can get the taxman out of it.
Connect the winch hook to the vault door!

Deep inside the projects there's a fortified building, the headquarters of a local gang running a lucrative drugs operation. In this building there's a panic room bolted to the floor - and inside the panic room there's a fortune in cash. $NL; $NL;Getting into the building is easy, but the panic room is a tougher nut to crack. It'll take days to cut it open, and you don't have that much time. So if you can't get in, how are you going to get to all that money? The answer is simple: steal the whole room.
Hide from the blast and get the keys
Find a less guarded entrance into the building.
Find a way to get into the FBI office building
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to cut the blue wire
Keep police away from the cutter or they will stop it!
The BFD will drill down through the Gambling Hall and into the vault. Start her up!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to place the water tank
Locate crates that contain voting machines and then hack the voting machines.
Find out which railcar contains the prototype turret and break into it.
Wait for BFD to get into position
Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a drill and called the police
You need a BFD tool to fix the BFD
The alarm has activated a second feature on the gate. Locate the hacked computer in the managment area and use it to release the magnetic lock.
Connect the server so that Hoxton can access it.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the saw blade
Find and use two keycards to open the Panic Room door.
Make a decision to either steal or destroy the weapons
Enter the main area of the docks.
Find the last number for the armory code
The lumber yard is a safe place where you can wait.
Jump out of the cargo doors.
Drive the rubber boat along the sewers to reach Locke and the helicopter.
Open the marked storage units and find the diamonds!
Escape with the helicopter or stay and look for more loot.
Your parachutes are stored close by. Get them. You will need them.
Wait for the skylight barrier hack to finish.
Enter the Bodhi's dry cleaning establishment
Get into the lumber yard where the EMP has been dropped.
The mechanic wants you to collect specific tools from the workshop. Search through the toolboxes and bring it to him!
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up the keychain
The blimp carrying the drill is en-route. Wait for it.
The cops freed a civilian - control the civilians!
Hide the body inside the janitor closet.
Find the guest inside the Gambling Hall
Cover Charon while he lockpicks the gate.
Make it to the Bridge Pillar and take the stairs to the waiting scuba gear.
The drill has stopped. Restart it!
Alarm tripped: Police detected a fire
Light the flare to signal to the chopper pilot where you want him to drop the C4
One of the money pallets has broken and cash is scattered about the town. Collect them and put them back on the pallet.
Search the forest for any loot
Saw open the doors into the icu
Find and enter the correct symbols
Hand over at least 1 bag of diamonds to Mr. Blonde. It is your decision if you want to secure more.
Find the system access point so Bain can hack into it and unlock the security door.
Wait for the drill to finish.
Disable the anti air system so that the plane can fly in and drop the EMP.
Wait for Bile to arrive with the winch parts.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to connect the winch to the BFD
There are shipping crates stored in the clubhouse. Open them, search for an engine and deliver it to the mechanic!
Place the drill on the vault
Take the bomb parts to the helicopter
Conceal your identity. Keep your mask on.
You can pick up ammo from dead law enforcers.
Search the arena for a fire extinguisher and put the fire out!
In order to start filling up the wagon with water, you need to connect the hose with a wagon.
Bile is on his way with the C4. Hold tight.
Gather around the Christmas tree and escape!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take loot from the vehicle
Keep moving. We need to find that server room.
The drill has jammed. Repair it.
Fight through the apartments to catch the Commissar!
We're going to need some ammo to go with the turret. Twelve bags should do it. Same drop off point.
We have some information, but if you can handle it, we could use more. So scan more or grab the server and leave.
Use the tool to cut the barrier open.
There should be a scanner that we can use to scan the test subjects somewhere, find it
Look for a way inside the museum.
Throw a bag over the yellow wall by the auto repair shop.
Wait for Twitch to arrive with the getaway van!
We found Bain, now we have to wait for the cell to open.
The wine we're after is in one of the red gift boxes in the store. Open them and find the wine!
Escape in the truck, but you must need your car.
Secure the loot bags at the designated drop off location.
Water pump nearby will easily fill the wagon. Connect the hose with pump first and then keep extending it until you reach the wagon!
Alarm tripped: Police saw someone breaking and entering
Return to the Operations Room to continue defending Hoxton.
SWATS incoming! Use the planks from inside the warehouse to barricade the windows. Watch the entrances!
The mechanic waits for you to grab his equipment!
Find the panic room which is somewhere inside the FBI safe house. The traitor is held inside.
Find the server and scramble the voting data
Matt's ride crashed not far from here, hurry up and you'll catch him.
Carry the bags with coke from the roof and place it infront of the vault door
Move the goats to the truck
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to hand over the tool
Find the safe with money in it
Head back to where you came in.

Pour out the thermite in the office above the vault - it will burn a hole through the steel floor. There are two cans of thermite hidden inside the copy machine, if both are carried to the vault it will speed up the melting process.
Make your way back to the van. Remember, you can't afford to kill any more guards.
Find some thermite and place it in the bathtub to create a hole. That should surely piss him off!
Grab the C4 and use it on the construction site wall.
Got the Key to the Panic Room!
The escape vehicle is on the way. Defend your position!
Get a gas can and put it on the tire pit. It will create a smoke screen.
Escape is now available. You can leave or stay for more loot.
Hack the auctioneer's computer to get the code to the vault.
Open up the Gensec truck and steal the gold
Move downstairs, away from the C4!
Wait for the water to fill the wagon
Join with Locke near the surface exit.
Help your downed teammate back up.

Look for the keycards, you need 2 of them to open the dock gate. Check inside the buildings for them. Look on the tables and near computers. Check the locker room, too. Don't waste your time looking for them outside.
Bile will drop you a thermal drill.
Raise the balloon and wait for the plane
Defend the tank and pump. Don't let swats interrupt either one.
Find and hack the correct computer
Gain access to the server room
Wait until the server is exposed before you hit them! That server is the only way to make our transaction!
Place a flare to signal the escape helicopter.
Use the computer in the server room to start uploading the files to the FBI
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the caustic soda
Go back to the van and pick up C4. Place it on the street outside to prepare the escape.
Make your way along the plane to reach the control panel on the upper deck.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to copy data from the USB stick
Stand back and enjoy the show!
Find the manager's keycard. He's probably carrying it on him.
You can select the ammo bag in your inventory and press $BTN_USE_ITEM; to place it.
Grab the keycard from inside the safe!
Get the server from the limo and make your way to the transfer room to plug it in.
Pick up the box from the crate.
Transport the nuclear warheads to Vlad's train in the old dockyard.
Follow the armored truck to where it stopped.
Find the last number for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
Open up the Gensec truck and steal its contents
Time to start over again, get to the exit and run down the hallway. Time is ticking!
You killed a civilian! Trade penalty: 10 seconds.
Wait by the elevator for the VIP
Hack the ship control terminal to start the ship moving procedure.
You need to restart the data scrambling
Search through the mall for a shopping bag containing the tin toy. They should be scattered around the stores.
Wait for the timelock to open the vault. Keep an eye out on the timer.
To reach the paintings, access the security room and hack the security system
Enter the airport and locate the weapon shipment
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to switch fire mode.$NL; $AMMO_LEFT;% ammo left.
Find the rats and kill them
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a sentry gun
Figure out which engine it is
Let the thermite paste do its magic. It's chewing through thick metal but it shouldn't take too long.
Grab the Thermal Lance which Bile has dropped nearby.
Drill through the vault door using the Thermal Drill.
Move the SWAT van from the truck's path.
The Commissar will call Bain through a hotline. This way Bain can track his position to find out where exactly he is hiding at.
Bring any evidence related to Hoxton's case to the Laboratory for analysis.
Stay cool and defend the coke, the boat is on its way
You need to carry a bag to attach it
Get into the house and meet Hector's cooks
Drill your way into the vault.
The escape helicopter will arrive soon on the roof of the bank, get the bags over there.
Cannot enter the vehicle while Swan Song is active
Throw the parts you've found into the mechanic's truck!
Look for a way inside the the chamber of the Diamond.
Use circle cutters to open the vaults from beneath.
Grant access from the security consoles
Set a drill up on the cage doors and wait for them to open.
Wait for the helicopter to pick you up.
Figure out which staff computer it is and access it locally. Worst case scenario you can always hack them all.
Get access to the secret criminal enterprise under Mitchell's pool.
Hack the correct laptop to access the securty barrier panel. You will have a limited time to open the barrier afterward, so hurry!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to activate the barcode reader
Keep the cops from stopping the drill.
Find and enter the shoe store on the first floor.
The hose has come loose, reconnect it to start pumping again.
See to it that the drill finishes it's job. The cops might try to turn the power off.
The drink is now poisoned. Wait for chemistry and biology to do their work. When he runs for the bathroom, follow him. Deal with him in a remote spot.
There is some evidence related to the traitor that isn't present on the servers. Locate the Forensics Department.
Wait for the helicopter to drop the C4 on the roof.
Alarm tripped: Police detected a criminal

The batch is done. If you want to cook another one just add some more ephadrine pills. Otherwise there is a flare ready to be lit ontop of the barrel covered with a blanket. An escape vehicle is waiting for the signal to come and pick you up.
Make sure you pick up all of the cage parts in order to assemble the cage.
Secure the loot in the escape vehicle
Find the laptops with the vault codes
We're going to need some ammo to go with the turret. Twenty bags should do it. Same drop off point.
Alarm tripped: Police detected a body bag
Find a way to open the reinforced door
Take the bomb parts from the case.
Pick up the server from the rack
Hold the fort while waiting for the results
Wait for the panic room to unlock
Go to the money pallet and attach it to the helicopter.
Take the medallion from the box inside the floor.
Access the FBI communication relay on the telephone pole.
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a fire
Use the passwords Charon gave you and hack into the manifest.
Locate some gas cans. Chances are they are around the gas station.
Get the vault loot to the helicopter
Alex uses the crane to lift the limo from the open street ontop of the building.
Stay alive until the loot boat arrives
Escort Hoxton to the Central Server Room
Pick up the bag containing the thermite.
Throw the gold into the back of the van.
Charon is in trouble. Find a way down to the basement and meet up with him.
Wait for the helicopter to arrive while looking for loot in the forest.
Get the server to the van
Use the correct tools to open the crate.
Find your way into his house, and get into the server room
Passing blocking guards will blow your cover!
Patience is a virtue! It's gonna take a couple of minutes to fill it up so dig in and stay alive.
Use the computer to hack the keypad to disable the bulletproof glass display case.
Locate and get into the hidden vault
Shout at the pilot to wake him up
Rotate the weapon to face the door to the storage area.
Scan more or grab the server
Start the generator to start pumping the water.
Proceed further inside the FBI headquarters.
Try to enter the auction house without raising the alarm.
Pump the sleeping gas into ventilation
Breach the bank near the polling stations
Connect the fuel hose to the ship
Find a way into the oval office
Alarm tripped: Too many innocent casualities
There's some old information that isn't stored in the digital system. Access the Archives to retrieve them.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to start hacking the skylight control panel
Find the electric box and cut the mains leading to the vault, to disable the electrified booby-trap.
The helicopter is on its way, hold out until it arrives.
Smash up and bag the meth
Take another engine to the helicopter
Secure more bags or wait for Twitch
Hold out until Bain finds an escape
Use ziplines in the elevator shaft to reach the surface. You can also stay and find more loot.
Get to the van and escape from the premises!
Drop the money into the truck!
Stockholm Syndrome: Press Jump to use
The only thing in your way now is the back door of the train. Blow it up using your C4!
Wait for Bain to call you
Investigate the storage room, it's supposed to have the car keys. Let's see what security they have.
Time to leave. Gather on the boat.
Climb up the ladder and enter the hold of this Murkywater cargo plane.
Steal the truck and use it to retrieve the safes.
You need the elevator maintenance key
Throw the engine into the helicopter and wait for it to be analyzed
You can leave now or stay and get more loot, it is up to you.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to add the hydrogen chloride
Go and get spare parts to repair the Beast
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a broken camera
Kill the sniper in the building across the street.
Disable the camera with the ECM Jammer.
Alarm tripped: Blackmailer called the police
BFD needs a lot of electricity. Hook her up to two power sockets.
There should be a button somewhere to open the hidden safe. It'll be hidden, so try moving or rotating vases or other obejcts.
Collect two cannisters of liquid nitrogen from Mr. Blonde's car out in the street.
The panic room should be in a flat on the third floor.
Now that you have all EMP parts, you can escape or secure more loot.
Bile has dropped the pieces for the winch. Go and grab them.
Carry the paintings and throw them into the van
Use the keyboard to reactivate the computer and continue the hacking.
Find the vault in a Murkywater container
Hold out while Bain sends in some C4 via helicopter.
Alarm tripped: Police detected an open vault
Plant C4 on the floor of the Gambling Hall. There are two spots. One of them will be the weak spot. There's enough C4 to blow both.
Disable the anti air defences so that Locke can pick you up.
Signal the helicopter pilot with a flare
Get the administrator codes from the Taxman! Screams, threats and a good old beating - anything goes - we are in a hurry!
Bring the missing server back to Hoxton so that he can continue looking for the information he needs.
Wait for the poison to work
Put two validated samples into the cooler
Answer the phone to make the trade
Use the cargo controls to release the money pallets.
Steal the gold to make it look like a robbery.
The helicopter has arrived! Escort the pilot to it.
Either choose to escape or decide to stay and upload the second database which will increase your chances of intercepting the right truck later.
Use crowbars to jam the vault ventilation
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to toggle between explosive and sensor mode
The plane is waiting for you on the road.
The van is on its way!
Alarm tripped: Police detected a weapon
Wait for the thermite to finish burning
Gain access to the Control Room.
Decide on a location where you want to intercept the package. Blow up the train or infiltrate the dockyard? Remember, only Plan A can be done quietly.
Help Locke and Bain reach the helipad
Alarm tripped: Police detected a saw
Take the engine to the helicopter
Use the flare on the run way to call down the helicopter
Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
Locate Garrett's office in the heart of the building. Watch out for guards and cameras!
The heat is rising inside the vault. Wait for the automatic failsafe to open the door.
Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a hostage
Search Garrett's office for the correct code to the safe!
You have survived the challenge, now claim your prize!
The Elephant sends his regards and left a little gift for you. Make sure you pick it up before you leave - because you are worth it.
Place the device on the keypad
You have been helped up by $HELPER;!
Defend the wheel, don't let anyone disable it or there will be a penalty!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to connect the cable to the power socket
No one likes prisons, but there's something that is different about this one. Time to find out what.
In order for a plane to land on the road, you need to cut the surrounding trees down.
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a criminal
Use the keycard provided by Locke to initiate the airlock opening sequence.
Hack an FBI computer for the code
Find and disable the anti-air system
Find the laptop located on the second floor.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up the keycard
Move around in the mall and destroy $50.000 worth of stuff
Put thermite on the vault to melt the door hinges.
Take the keycard from the safe and head to the evidence room!
Wait for the magnet to be lowered
Carry the prototype turret parts to the drop off
Enter the vault code found on the laptop to unlock the vault.
Use the correct tools to open the crate.
Get to the helicopter and escape!
Defend the cooks and cook the meth
Look for clues around the docks and in the warehouses, find out which one of the trucks is shipping the voting machines to Washington and then tag it with your GPS.
Alarm tripped: Police detected a hostage
Secure Vlad's packages under the tree
Get to the crash site and help Mr. Pink out of the vehicle!
Apply C4 to the wall next to the server room and blow a hole into the neighboring building.
Gather Matt and the Gang under the Helicopter
Wait for the panic room to unlock.
The escape is now available. The helicopter is waiting for you. You can leave or stay for more loot.
Enter the bunker located in the backyard. Collect the seat and bring it to the mechanic!
Defeat Sosa's security in the main hall
Get the server, plug it in
Secure more diamond bags at Mr. Blonde's location or simply wait for the escape!
Wait until Charon finds a way up the building.
Find and start hacking the security system
Wait for the weapon to be powered up.
Looks like something messed up with the BFD. Take the tools and repair her.
The escape helicopter should arrive in a couple of minutes. Dig in and stay alive until then!
Collect batteries to power up the weapon.
We need to make the truck lighter. Remove the armor plating so you can escape.
Wait for Bile to deliver the Thermal Lance
Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
Investigate the facility with the console panel.
Find a way into the car shop without getting detected.
Get the explosives in the dumpster and breach the door.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up.$NL; $AMMO_LEFT;% ammo left.
Wait for the liquid nitrogen to fully empty into the vault door.
Find and collect a memory stick
Mount the drill on the gate outside the vault area.
Make your way further inside the museum.
The EMP has opened the way down to the labs, get down there!
Defend the pick-up and keep the engine running
Empty the vault! Get the cash!
We must re-wire the security system to start the time lock.
Alarm tripped: Civilian heard a window break and called the police
Find the bank manager - look for a yellow outline once he's identified. You need his keycard to access the server room.
Use the drill parts to set up the Beast.
Use the override switches to force the main server open.
Find three numbers for the armory code
Open the security room door with the keycard.
Pick the C4 up and plant it around the dome
